$description: | What does this do? | Limits the default number of devices that a single user can enroll. The baseline sets this limit to 5, however it can be overwritten by other configurations with a higher priority. | | Why should you use this? | If you want to ensure that no more than 5 devices are enrolled by a single user to prevent enrollment of unwanted devices. | | What is the end-user impact? | High Impact. Users will be limited to enrolling 5 devices. | | Learn more | [Create a device limit restriction](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/mem/intune/enrollment/enrollment-restrictions-set#create-a-device-limit-restriction) |
